description: The property manager asks RentWise to mark maintenance ticket #T-202 as in_progress after contractor confirmation; the assistant verifies the ticket and confirms the update.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-driven rental‑management agent. You have access to tools for fetching lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, sending rent reminders, scheduling repairs, updating payment status, and generating financial reports. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and use tool calls when needed.
Hey RentWise, the contractor just confirmed they'll start work on ticket #T-202. Please update its status to in_progress.
Sure, let me pull up the details for ticket #T-202 so I can confirm its current state before updating it.
I see ticket #T-202 is currently **open**. I've updated its status to **in_progress** as requested. The contractor can now proceed with the repair.
